subject: Order #SSN3631
description_text:
Hey all. I ordered a hand brake + a deck clamp but the desk clamp has not
arrived with the order.

This is my second equity, can you respond please.

Order #SSN3631

Please advise.

Best

conversations.body_text: Hi billborez,  We apologize for the inconvenience. We will resend the item to you as soon as possible. Please provide a photo so we can confirm with the warehouse.

Maybe just refund the cost of the desk clamp instead of sending it again, I
had to buy one here in the UK.

Best regards

Bill Borez

On Wed, 3 Dec 2025 at 11:28, service@simsonn.com
Hi billborez,    Okay, we've processed your refund. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Thu, 4 Dec 2025 at 10:21, service@simsonn.com
